name: SonarQubePreBuild
description: Fetch the Quality Profile from SonarQube to configure the analysis
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: projectKey
inputs.label: Project Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project unique key, i.e. sonar.projectKey

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project name, i.e. sonar.ProjectName

inputs.name: projectVersion
inputs.label: Project Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project version, i.e. sonar.projectVersion

inputs.name: dbUrl
inputs.label: Db Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The database connection setting, e.g. jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://localhost/sonar;SelectMethod=Cursor

inputs.name: dbUsername
inputs.label: Db UserName
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The username for the database user

inputs.name: dbPassword
inputs.label: Db User Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The password for the database user

inputs.name: cmdLineArgs
inputs.label: Sonar-Runner arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pass additional arguments using the format: /d:propertyName=propertyValue

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: Config File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a configuration file with SonarQube properties
